name: Gas Cube
description:
The first game release from Bear Notch Studios...

GAS CUBE 0.22

Dodge falling cubes, buildings, trees, and even a few other surprises to reach the gas station at the end of each level.  With a fun retro soundtrack and simple controls, this 3D arcade game might be your new favorite.  Support us with a donation and we'll make more levels.  Suggestions are welcome!

Simple Controls:

W  - Speed Up

A - Slow Down

S - Left

D - Right

Space - Jump

Escape - Main Menu
